transport.name: Twitter
transport.description: Twitter Inbound HTTP Transport using Open Authentication.

propertyDefinition.label: Follow
propertyDefinition.description: A comma-separated list of user IDs.

propertyDefinition.label: Locations
propertyDefinition.description: A comma-separated list of (longitude,latitude) pairs indicating bounding boxes of locations (use ',' to seperate both the coordinate values and the bounding boxes.

propertyDefinition.label: Count
propertyDefinition.description: Number of backfill missed messages during disconnected. This parameter requires elevated access to use.
